Description:
Detects changes to the "ServiceDLL" value related to a service in the registry.
This is often used as a method of persistence.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: ServiceDll Hijack
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (((target_object like '%\system\%' and target_object like '%controlset%' and target_object like '%\services\%') and target_object like '%\parameters\servicedll') and  not (details = 'c:\windows\system32\spool\drivers\x64\3\printconfig.dll' or (process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\lsass.exe' and target_object like '%\services\ntds\parameters\servicedll' and details = '%%systemroot%%\system32\ntdsa.dll') or process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\poqexec.exe') and  not (process_path like '%\regsvr32.exe' and details = 'c:\windows\system32\stagent.dll'))
